B: ^The Sprint Review is a key meeting in Agile development, usually held at the end of each Sprint.
^It is used to present the results of the work completed in this Sprint and to discuss the next direction of the project with stakeholders.
^Hey, I've played your prototype game and I think that's great.
^Also, I'd like to see what the holiday rewards feature looks like as early as possible, so please bring that task forward. Thanks.
